function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of focus on the social and economical aspects of pandemics in governmental policymaking","Impact":"Ineffective policies and interventions, leading to a lack of holistic response to pandemics","Mitigation":"Incorporate social and economical factors into policymaking, seek diverse expert input","Technologies":"Data-driven modeling, agent-based simulation software","People":"Government policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Government policymakers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on a single model (ABM) for simulating epidemiological and economical effects","Impact":"Limited perspective and potential bias in decision-making","Mitigation":"Utilize multiple models for simulation and analysis, validate with real-world data","Technologies":"Model validation tools, diverse simulation techniques","People":"Government policymakers, scientific community","Owner":"Government policymakers, research institutions"},{"Description":"Limited generalizability of results to wider contexts","Impact":"Inaccurate and misleading policy recommendations","Mitigation":"Ensure diverse and representative input data, conduct sensitivity analysis, validate with real-world data","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, sensitivity analysis techniques","People":"Government policymakers, social and economic experts","Owner":"Government policymakers, research institutions"}]}
